SELECT c.*, 
       COALESCE(recent.avg_completion_time, c.estimated_minutes) as typical_duration,
       COALESCE(recent.completion_rate, 1.0) as user_completion_rate
FROM chores c
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT chore_id, 
         AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (completed_at - created_at))/60)::INTEGER as avg_completion_time,
         COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 END)::FLOAT / COUNT(*) as completion_rate
  FROM chore_assignments
  WHERE user_id = $1
    AND created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY chore_id
) recent ON c.id = recent.chore_id
WHERE c.is_active = true
ORDER BY c.frequency, c.difficulty

INSERT INTO chore_assignments (chore_id, user_id, assigned_date, due_date, status)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3::DATE, $4::DATE, $5)
ON CONFLICT (chore_id, user_id, assigned_date) DO UPDATE
SET due_date = EXCLUDED.due_date,
    status = EXCLUDED.status,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
RETURNING *

SELECT c.*, ca.* 
FROM chore_assignments ca
JOIN chores c ON ca.chore_id = c.id
WHERE ca.user_id = $1
  AND ca.assigned_date >= $2::DATE
  AND ca.assigned_date < $2::DATE + INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY ca.assigned_date, c.difficulty
